title: What font is this?
content:
Hi there?

Just want to knot the name of the font used in this image.  
Thanks a lot.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804233000im_/http:/typophile.com/files/FONT_5774.JPG)
author: leoj_md

comments.content:
Don't you think it could be _Pencilmade®_ from **Someguy Foundry**?

Seriously, not every script is a typeface by necessity

Don't know it either. [Kimberly Geswein](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804233000/http:/www.myfonts.com/foundry/Kimberly_Geswein) (many more available through her [website](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804233000/http:/www.kimberlygeswein.com/)) has some interesting alternatives though such as [Strawberry Limeade](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804233000/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/kimberly-geswein/kg-strawberry-limeade)
